com.facebook.buck.apple

Class AbstractAppleNativeTargetBuildRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.AbstractBuildRule
      • com.facebook.buck.cxx.AbstractNativeBuildRule
        • com.facebook.buck.apple.AbstractAppleNativeTargetBuildRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBuildTarget, BuildRule, Comparable<HasBuildTarget>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppleBinary, AppleLibrary

    public abstract class AbstractAppleNativeTargetBuildRule
extends AbstractNativeBuildRule
    A build rule that has configuration ready for Xcode-like build systems.
